replies.body:
I feel as though Bad Company have been misrepresented with their dominant streak of 87 matches including 2 unofficial tournaments. 

With the official Tournaments i feel that BC were cheated out of it. First tourney was ours to lose, we f*cked berzerk in the semis and beat them but then tazz being the cheating little bastard he is had us dq'ed.

Second tournament some stupid f*cker who made the map SandOceanTE didn't think to put boundaries underneath and we lost due to that.
